title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom in Bridgeport! Coleman Apts.
app_fee: $50.00 application fee. Good credit and good income are required to qualify.
posting_body: ['Description', 'Mid-Rise Building with Elevator', 'Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment located in our apartment complex near downtown Bridgeport.', 'Newly renovated apartment with 2 bedrooms and one bathroom.', 'Kitchen separate from living space.', 'Heat and hot water included!', 'Laundry and storage located in the building.', 'Comes with 2 parking spot located in our private lot.', 'Indoor cats are welcomed!', 'Luxury apartments in Bridgeport, CT.', "Area attractions include: the finest beaches on the Long Island Sound, boating facilities, the University of Bridgeport, the Bridgeport Bluefish, The Sound Tigers Hockey Team, Harbor Yard, theaters, and Captain's Cove are only a short distance away.", 'Located near the Bridgeport Metro North train station and I95.', 'Fifty Five Miles from New York City.', 'Features', '*Cable ready', '*Microwave', '*Hardwood floors', '*Air conditioning', '*Refrigerator', '*Dishwasher', '*Oven / range', '*Heat - gas', '*Laundry room', '*Elevator', '*Private Parking', '*Storage units', '$50 application Fee.', 'Good credit and good income are required to qualify.', 'Call Alyson 203-520-6372']
